item.title: WitnessAI Raises $58 Million for AI Security Platform
item.dc:creator: Ionut Arghire
item.description:
The company will use the fresh investment to accelerate its global go-to-market and product expansion.

The post WitnessAI Raises $58 Million for AI Security Platform appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: Robo-Advisor Betterment Discloses Data Breach
item.dc:creator: Ionut Arghire
item.description:
A threat actor breached Betterment’s systems, accessed customer information, and sent scam crypto-related messages.

The post Robo-Advisor Betterment Discloses Data Breach appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: Fortinet Patches Critical Vulnerabilities in FortiFone, FortiSIEM
item.dc:creator: Ionut Arghire
item.description:
Exploitable without authentication, the two security defects could lead to configuration leak and code execution.

The post Fortinet Patches Critical Vulnerabilities in FortiFone, FortiSIEM appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: Chrome 144, Firefox 147 Patch High-Severity Vulnerabilities
item.dc:creator: Ionut Arghire
item.description:
The two browser updates resolve 26 security defects, including bugs that could be exploited for code execution.

The post Chrome 144, Firefox 147 Patch High-Severity Vulnerabilities appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: Microsoft Patches Exploited Windows Zero-Day, 111 Other Vulnerabilities
item.dc:creator: Eduard Kovacs
item.description:
Two vulnerabilities patched this month by Microsoft were disclosed publicly before fixes were released.

The post Microsoft Patches Exploited Windows Zero-Day, 111 Other Vulnerabilities appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: CrowdStrike to Acquire Browser Security Firm Seraphic for $420 Million
item.dc:creator: Mike Lennon
item.description:
News of the move to acquire Seraphic comes less than a week after CrowdStrike announced an agreement to acquire identity security startup SGNL for $740 million.

The post CrowdStrike to Acquire Browser Security Firm Seraphic for $420 Million appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: Adobe Patches Critical Apache Tika Bug in ColdFusion
item.dc:creator: Ionut Arghire
item.description:
Adobe has released patches for 25 vulnerabilities across its products, including a critical Apache Tika flaw in ColdFusion.

The post Adobe Patches Critical Apache Tika Bug in ColdFusion appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: GoBruteforcer Botnet Targeting Crypto, Blockchain Projects
item.dc:creator: Ionut Arghire
item.description:
The botnet’s propagation is fueled by the AI-generated server deployments that use weak credentials, and legacy web stacks.

The post GoBruteforcer Botnet Targeting Crypto, Blockchain Projects appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: After Goldman, JPMorgan Discloses Law Firm Data Breach
item.dc:creator: Eduard Kovacs
item.description:
The law firm Fried Frank seems to be informing high-profile clients about a recent data security incident. 

The post After Goldman, JPMorgan Discloses Law Firm Data Breach appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: Cyber Insights 2026: External Attack Surface Management
item.dc:creator: Kevin Townsend
item.description:
AI will assist companies in finding their external attack surface, but it will also assist bad actors in locating and attacking the weak points.

The post Cyber Insights 2026: External Attack Surface Management appeared first on SecurityWeek.
